JobFullDesc: About the Role Uber Eats is revolutionizing instant delivery and making dining effortless: from eating locally, to ordering groceries, to celebrating with a bottle of wine. The options are endless. Working at Eats means delivering on all possibilities, not just for customers, but for merchants trying to grow their business and for delivery people searching for earnings opportunities. This role calls for creative problem-solving, advanced analytics, critical thinking, a desire for execution and outstanding relationship building to partner with cross functional teams. What You'll DoResponsible for developing, operationalizing and measuring strategies to enable Uber Eats to hit our strategic objectivesScale processes, build solutions and support product launches to improve the customer experience for consumers, merchants, and delivery partners.Collaborate with several cross-functional teams to bring initiatives to life, including Tech, Policy, Legal, Strategy & Planning, Marketing, Finance and HQ. Basic Qualifications A minimum 3 years of relevant work experience (management consulting, investment banking, operations, etc.)Proficient in Excel and data analysis  Preferred QualificationsAbility to thrive in a fast-paced and ambiguous environmentExperience leading cross-functional stakeholders in order to execute high-impact projectsStrong verbal and written communication skillsBias for action, with strong problem solving skillsComfort with navigating and working in a matrixed organizationSQL experience
